name: System.Defense
description:
It seems like the WebGL build didn't want to work so I provided an downloadable version. Sorry for the inconvenience!

Instructions: A tower defense puzzle game idea. Stop bad packages from breaking through your firewall. 

  • Scroll to Zoom
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Pan

Turrets:

  • Scanner - will scan packages to determine if they are good or bad
  • Standard - will shoot packages
  • Reversal - sends package back to the web
